page.title: 04HUISH
page.content:
The parish of{Huish}is sparcely populated except for the settlement of Heanton Satchville,which is the home of{Lord Clinton}the principal land-owner.Today less than 50 people live there,although more than 150 did so one hundred years ago.
A{Church},dedicated to St.James, is the only amenity to be found in the whole parish.
Only 3 children from{Huish}attend school in{Merton}despite the fact that no less than 23 were at the old school in{Huish}( now closed) in 1861.
Much of{Huish}consists of the park and woodland of {The Clinton {Estate }which is stocked with game to provide shooting for special guests.
